name: Untitled, a Day in the Life of a Lowly Paid Security Guard
name_original: Untitled, a Day in the Life of a Lowly Paid Security Guard
description:
Untitled, a Day in the Life of a Lowly Paid Security Guard is a fancy version of Asteroids.

 It boasts typical Unreal Engine graphics, fully voiced dialogue, and a twist ending that will keep you coming back... literally.

  • Programming and Game Design by Ben Nguyen
  • 3D Assets primarily used from free example projects provided by Epic Games
  • Audio used from freesound.org, dialogue recorded using http://www.fromtexttospeech.com
